result.execSummary:
The defendant Baakia M Clark was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Baakia M Clark is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Baakia M Clark was found guilty of Possess Firearm-Convicted of a Felony, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $250 DNA surcharge and court costs remitted. $92  VW surcharge  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.

Consec to Waukesha Co Case 20CF1118 and Milwaukee Co Case 18CF928.  To be served in WPS pursuant to sec. 973.03(2).  Defendant is eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program.  Defendant is eligible for the Substance Abuse Program.
Consecutive to: Waukesha Co Case 20CF1118 and Milwaukee Co Case 18CF928.

Copy of minutes from PLEAS Hrg on 7/19/22 sent electronically to DCJ and DOC.

IN CUSTODY   10:52 AM Defendant Baakia M Clark in court with attorney Jacob A Idlas. Prosecuting Atty Cecilia E DeMarco appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to count 1.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. 


On Motion of the State, the Court DISM repeater enhancer on Count 1
On Motion of the State, the Court DISM Count 2 . 

Victim Rights Compliance

COUNT 1
The Court sentences Defendant to:
-Serve  3 months in Dane County Jail, with Huber; cs Waukesha County case 20CF1118, and Milwaukee County case2018CF928
-to be served in the WSP pursuant to 973.03(2)
-Eligible for Earned Release Program and Challenge Incarceration Program. 

-Days credit for time served:  0 days
-Days credit to jail: 0 days

COURT COSTS:
Ct 1
- All CC and DNA surcharge waived. V/W surcharge due w/in 60 days.


-DNA on file


-Defendant advised of post-conviction rights

02:45 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Devonte D Windham.  Lexi Keyes appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties by Zoom. The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts. Court dismissed Count 3 sua sponte without objection by State. COUNT 3 DISMISSED.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.
